overview: Tim Kelly has over 20 years experience in financial solutions. Tim most recently served as vice president of business development for Harland Financial Solutionsâ€™, UltraData-Enterprise system. During his 10 year tenure with the company, he spearheaded key sales initiatives and contributed significantly to profitability and growth. Harland Financial’s marquee technology solution, the UltraData-Enterprise system, is one of the leading credit union core systems in the industry. Tim holds a Bachelor of Business Administration degree from Texas State University (1983). Tim is a student of his customers, profession, and industry.
